text: David Michael Bennett (5 March 1939 – November 2009) was an English professional footballer who played for Arsenal, Portsmouth, Southampton, Bournemouth and Guildford City, as a winger. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2009 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Arsenal F.C. players Category:Portsmouth F.C. players Category:Southampton F.C. players Category:AFC Bournemouth players Category:Guildford City F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Association football wingers
title: Dave Bennett (footballer, born 1939)
